personas.name: Noah Allen
personas.relevant_history: Has tried limits and occasional deletions with mixed results.
personas.in_their_voice: I want to reduce scroll time without deleting everything.

personas.name: Emma Baker
personas.relevant_history: Can reduce usage short-term but rebounds during stressful weeks.
personas.in_their_voice: I do better with visible progress than private reminders.

personas.name: Liam Chen
personas.relevant_history: Needs a lower-friction option than strict blocking.
personas.in_their_voice: Hard blockers usually backfire for me.

personas.name: Olivia Allen
personas.relevant_history: Prefers behavior support that keeps social connection intact.
personas.in_their_voice: I need a middle path that lasts beyond week one.
